entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of rain. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of rain except periods of snow over higher terrain overnight. Fog patches. Wind becoming north 20 km/h after midnight. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of rain. Temperature steady near plus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of rain except periods of snow over higher terrain in the morning. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near plus 3. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers in the evening and after midnight. A few flurries beginning after midnight. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023
